jobTitle: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, User Insights
jobDescription: Our mission is to help people everywhere find a job and company they love. We are disrupting an industry by changing how people search for jobs and how companies recruit top talent.  Glassdoor is leading the industry in how jobs seekers are matched to a job and we are building state of the art algorithms to power personalized jobs search experience for 55+ Million unique users per month and growing.  You will be part of a highly talented team of machine learning engineers and data scientists using the latest open source technologies and frameworks such as Apache Solr, Spark, Tensor Flow, Cassandra to build our personalized Jobs search experience and provide unique insights optimized for scale and performance.  Join us if you have a deep understanding of machine learning techniques and experience implementing those models at large scale in real world applications.
